description: An publication such as a journal article.

description.description: Bibliography as text, in Markdown format underneath Frontmatter (---) in Markdown files

items.description: ID of the organization. This is preferably an URI where the organization's metadata can be resolved, e.g., /organization/nlesc.

endorsedBy.description: Organizations that endorse this entry, e.g. software made by, owned by, or used by the this organization; Used for grouping items on the website per organization.

publishedIn.description: Title of the container holding the item (e.g. the book title for a book chapter, the journal title for a journal article). In Citation Style Language (CSL) it is the `container-title` field.

date.description: Date the item was issued/published. In Citation Style Language (CSL) it is the `issued` field.

type.description: Type of citation. In Citation Style Language (CSL) it is the `type` field.

schema.description: Fixed property, to validate the JSON object with the current schema.

author.description: ID of projects that are responsible for the publication.

items.description: ID of a project, preferably an URI where the project's metadata can be resolved, e.g., http://software.esciencecenter.nl/project/emetabolomics
